description: Sent whenever a referral event happens and the classic program is disabled
title: Classic Disabled Referral Webhook Schema

___dateModified.description: The date this referral was last modified for any reason (e.g. converted, reward added, etc.)
___dateModified.title: Date Referral Modified

$eref.description: The unique identifiers used to distinguish a user.
$eref.title: User Identifier Schema

___accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account this user belongs to
___accountId.title: Account Id

___referred.description: The referred user who initiated this referral
___referred.title: Referred User

___dateUserModified.description: The date a user was added to or removed from the referral (e.g. removed as a result of user deletion)
___dateUserModified.title: Date User Modified

___dateReferralStarted.description: The date this referral was created
___dateReferralStarted.title: Date Referral Started

$eref.description: The unique identifiers used to distinguish a user.
$eref.title: User Identifier Schema

___accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account this user belongs to
___accountId.title: Account Id

___referrer.description: The referrer user in who initiated this referral
___referrer.title: Referrer User

___programId.description: The Id of the program this code was created for
___programId.title: Program Id
